name: Dash Rider
description:
Dashrider is a round-based 2D shooter. The game is all about speed, precision, and action.


Fast-paced and action-packed gameplay


The gameplay is based on very fast movements and maneuvers while being under permanent attack. One of the most essential moves is the dash, which can be used to trick or escape your enemy. Unlock new skills to dominate the fight for a short period of time. Pick up unique abilities to boost your firepower and shield yourself against counterattacks. Improve your fighting techniques and beat your personal high score.


Various types of enemies


A variety of enemies will try to kill you in many different ways. You will need to dodge battalions of aggressive enemies, bullets, and lasers. They will become more powerful, the further you advance in the game.


Stunning boss fights


Unlock intense boss fights progressing in the classic game mode. Bosses will unleash heavy rounds of attacks. You will need to develop unique strategies to destroy them.
